content: यज्ञः [यज्-भावे न] {@--1@} A sacrifice, sacrificial rite; any offering or oblation; यज्ञेन यज्ञमयजंत देवाः; तस्माद्यज्ञात्सर्वहुतः &c. {@--2@} An act of worship, any pious or devotional act. (Every householder, but particularly a Brāhmaṇa, has to perform five such devotional acts every day; their names are: --भूतयज्ञ, मनुष्ययज्ञ, पितृयज्ञ, देवयज्ञ, and ब्रह्मयज्ञ, which are collectively called the five ‘great sacrifices’; see महायज्ञ, and the five words separately). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Agni. {@--4@} Of Viṣṇu.
